power_supply_status.description: Property.  The charging status as reported. Values defined above

power_supply_health.description: Property.  The battery health metric. Values defined above

power_supply_technology.description: Property.  The battery chemistry. Values defined above

temperature.description: Property.  Temperature in Degrees Celsius (If unmeasured NaN)

current.description: Property.  Negative when discharging (A) (If unmeasured NaN)

charge.description: Property.  Current charge in Ah (If unmeasured NaN)

capacity.description: Property.  Capacity in Ah (last full capacity) (If unmeasured NaN)

design_capacity.description: Property.  Capacity in Ah (design capacity) (If unmeasured NaN)

percentage.description: Property.  Charge percentage on 0 to 1 range (If unmeasured NaN)

present.description: Property.  True if the battery is present

location.description: Property.  If individual temperatures unknown but number of cells known set each to NaN  The location into which the battery is inserted. (slot number or plug)

serial_number.description: Property.  The best approximation of the battery serial number
